page.title: 08GIRLS FASHION PART 2
page.content: Ans:=The most popular crazes were discos,Breakdancing,Love and Pop groups. We like both fashions equally.We like boys baggy trousers and we like girls baggy tops and we like tight jeans.We like three good pop groups they are Wham!,Duran Duran and Paul Young.We both like Paul Young but Emma doesn't like Wham that much and I don't like Duran Duran that much.The television programmes we like best are EastEnders and Dallas,we think they are excellent.On television there are a lot of American programmes like Dallas,Chips,The Fall Guy,Cover Up,Dynasty,Knight Rider and lots more. Hair styles have changed over the past two years.In 1984 the girls hair style that was in fashion was The Bob. In 1985 most girls have very short hair.
